channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Billionaire Ken Griffin says ‘the expectation today is that Donald Trump will win the White House’
item.description: Trump and Vice President Kamala Harris are in a dead heat with one week until Election Day.

item.title: Floods in Spain’s Valencia Region Kill Dozens
item.description: More than 1,000 soldiers from Spain’s emergency response units have been deployed and the death toll is expected to rise from one of the worst natural...

item.title: Why Jeff Bezos blocked the Washington Post endorsement
item.description: It has to do with Blue Origin, one longtime advisor says.

item.title: Europe Imposes Higher Tariffs on Electric Vehicles Made in China
item.description: The tariffs, some as high as 45 percent, are intended to protect Europe’s automotive sector, but they could escalate a trade war with China.

item.title: Torture Is a Russian Tactic in Occupied Ukraine, Civilians Say
item.description: Moscow is employing a variety of tactics, including torture and forced Russian citizenship, to try to obliterate Ukrainian identity, former detainees ...

item.title: UBS outshines expectations with $1.4 billion in profit but says macroeconomic outlook appears ‘gloomy’ due to U.S. election and geopolitical conflict
item.description: The Swiss bank, which suffered a $715 million loss in the same period last year after the forced takeover of Credit Suisse, posted a five percent incr...

item.title: Music and Morale in a Country at War
item.description: In Ukraine, where war feels omnipresent, music is helping lift spirits and raise money for the military.

item.title: At a Glitzy Saudi Investment Forum, Almost No Mention of War
item.description: Saudi Arabia and its Gulf neighbors are seeking to reassure foreign investors that it’s still safe to do business amid the turmoil around the Mideast.

item.title: Georgia funeral home owner jailed after 18 decomposing bodies found while authorities were serving an eviction notice
item.description: Chris Lee Johnson, 39, of Douglas, has been charged with 17 counts of abuse of a dead body, the Georgia Bureau of Investigation announced in a stateme...

item.title: Harris Makes Her Final Case, and Trump Seizes on ‘Garbage’

item.title: Harris’s Mission: Disqualify Trump, but Extend a Hand to His Voters
item.description: Kamala Harris, in her closing argument to voters, acknowledged an inescapable political reality: Donald Trump is not a fringe figure within his own pa...

item.title: Colorado accidentally put its voting system passwords online for months but state insists election is still secure
item.description: The passwords were only one of two that are needed to access any component of Colorado's voting systems, and are just one part of a layered security s...
